ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Goodies from Greenies
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, although I think the trivial loot code may still exist on some servers. I just don t know which ones. Probably PVP type to prevent players from killing
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, although I think the trivial loot code may still exist on some
servers. I just don't know which ones.
Probably PVP type to prevent players from killing other players to get
greenies loot.
luv,
-Su

> Thanks. Thought that they had dropped that trivial loot code.
>
> Barto
>
> --- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> > IIRC, my sister told me that the trivial loot crap didn't go over
> well and
> > that it screwed some people from being able to do their epics so
> they
> > stopped it. So as far as I know, even greenies still drop the rare
> loot.
> > luv,
> > -Su
> >
